| IAVUPMFITXYVAF-XPUUQOCRSA-N
}} 'Dorzolamide' (trade name 'Trusopt') is a carbonic anhydrase inhibitor. It is
an anti-glaucoma agent, and acts by decreasing the production of aqueous
humour. [http://www.drugs.com/pro/dorzolamide.html Dorzolamide] at
Drugs.com. Revised: 12/2011 It is optically applied in the form of a 2%
eye drops.
